entry.title: Motion to Activate BIP 3
entry.summary: The email praises the recipient, Murch, for their exceptional work in drafting a document or proposal, highlighting the meticulous effort in incorporating feedback from various sources. It acknowledges the significant improvement this document represents over previous versions and supports its adoption. The sender, Ruben, expresses gratitude for Murch's dedication and hard work towards the project. This exchange underscores the collaborative spirit and the high value placed on community input within the Bitcoin Development Mailing List group, to which the recipient is subscribed.
